channel.title: How can i make an item do commands?
channel.description: ok i have used moparscape for about a month and i have learnt java language along the way and am up to makeing my own server name noonescape but how do you make an item do something liek for example the magical lyre which already has a play button and the examine says when i play this i will be teleported to : how do u make it when i play i get teleported to somewhere
